workExperience.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
duties: Spearheaded a development project alongside approx. 300 developers for the creation of the new infotainment system of a major automotive brand, leading the creation of multiple key features and maintaining direct communication with clients and adjacent teams to ensure task clarity and alignment.
Performed refinement of feature and bug tickets and led discussions with clients and leadership to align development timelines and balance workload.
Maintained and enhanced the infotainment systems of several major automotive brands which led to increased code quality and the introduction of new key features to the platforms.
Led the frontend development of an internal tool integrating LLMs into the software requirements process, meeting tight deadlines and collaborating with cross-functional teams and leadership.
Independently developed multiple dashboards in 6-8 week cycles using Angular, React, TypeScript and JavaScript and onboarded new developers to transition these into full-scale projects.

workExperience.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
duties: Led efforts to transition from the previous monolithic architecture of the platform to a microservice based architecture as part of a team made of 11 developers and QA engineers.
Maintained and enhanced an internal backend middleware platform that facilitated communication between multiple services and sanitises information for further use.
Demonstrated versatility by adapting to multiple tech stacks such as .NET, C#, SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Salesforce Lightning over the course of 2 projects.
Oversaw production deployments, carried out code reviews, and resolved any emergent difficulties assuring timely completion of requirements.

Maintained over 90% code test coverage in the projects through automated and integrated testing. Advocated other developers to ensure their code is thoroughly tested to lessen the workload of the QA team.

education.degree: Master of Engineering in Graphics, Multimedia and Virtual Reality
Bachelor of Engineering in Automatic Control and Computer Science

additionalCourses.course: Zero to Hero in Lightning Web Components

technicalSkills: Languages: C#, Java, Kotlin, TypeScript (Upper Intermediate), JavaScript, HTML5, CSS (Intermediate), C, C++, Python, Go (Basic)
Frameworks: .NET, Android, Android Auto, Angular, React
Development: OOP, Algorithms, Agile, LLMs, Unit Testing, Databases
Familiarity with Communication Protocols and Multi-Threading Programming
Fluent in Romanian (C2), English (C2) and intermediate proficiency in German (B1~B2)

pastJobs.description: Participant in the 'Work and Travel' program during the summer of 2018, contributing as a dedicated Bar Back at Dave and Buster's in Panama City, Florida, U.S.A. Developed transferable skills in teamwork, customer service, and adaptability. Excited to apply these experiences in future endeavors.

personalProjects.title: stefan.dog
personalProjects.description: A personal project for the current website. It also contains a Rock Paper Scissors deathmatch game simulator. It also includes a wrapper over the German public transport system, BVG to facilitate checking and tracking of public transport vehicles at certain stations. The information is being served to the website by a lightweight Golang based backend.

personalProjects.title: It's Fun To-Do RPG
personalProjects.description: Developed a gamified task manager integrating RPG mechanics, created as the culmination of the master's program. Designed to facilitate task management within a captivating game-like environment, empowering users to effectively complete tasks and achieve their goals.

personalProjects.title: Bachelor's Game
personalProjects.description: Game developed as bachelor project in the final year of college. Developed a first-person shooter game with RPG elements as a bachelor project, utilizing Unity and C#.

personalProjects.title: Cluj-Napoca Travel Companion
personalProjects.description: Created an application for tourists visiting Cluj-Napoca, offering information on tourist attractions and local reviews. Developed using Java, JavaFX, and ArcGIS API.
